body:
In some cases service does not write the task queue name but the specific task queue partition into event history, for example:

        "taskQueue": {
           "name": "/_sys/myTaskQueueName/2",
           "kind": "Normal"
        },

Server team pointed to possible cause:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/f51b96d9248701dbb3f7c64bbb984404558b6d3c/service/history/workflowTaskHandlerCallbacks.go#L246-L251
and
[https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/f51b96d9248701dbb3f7c64bbb984404558b6d3c/service/history/workflow/workflow_task_state_machine.go#L4[â€¦]67](https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/f51b96d9248701dbb3f7c64bbb984404558b6d3c/service/history/workflow/workflow_task_state_machine.go#L452-L467)


Note this does not fail the workflow task, workers are still able to pick it up, but it is confusing when looking at event history and also user can think its a bug or issue with service
title: Specific task queue partition name exposed in event history
